author: GameSpot
description:
It's been a wild year in the video game industry, so join us as we recap the most consequential events of the year.

0:00 Intro
0:42 EA goes private
3:22 Layoffs continue in the gaming industry
5:51 What's going on with Xbox
8:43 GTA 6 delay and union busting
11:57 Tariff impact
14:19 Positive Gaming News in 2025

#gaming #gamespot #spoton
title: The Gaming News Stories That Defined 2025 | Spot On

author: GameSpot
description:
Watch the full interview here: https://youtu.be/ZpExEzBwm4U

At The Game Awards 2025, Lucy sat down with Drew Karpyshyn and Chad Robertston from Archetype Entertainment, a studio working on upcoming sci-fi RPG Exodus. With development pedigree from studios like BioWare and Naughty Dog, they are working on an ambitious new RPG featuring tough decisions, squad mates, and of course, romance. It'll launch in 2027. 

#exodus #hasbro #masseffect
title: Exodus - Game Developer Interview

author: GameSpot

title: New Exodus Details: Romances, Matthew McConaughey, Mass Effect
